description: Improper access control in the subsystem for Intel(R) Smart Sound Technology may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access. This affects Intel® Smart Sound Technology before versions: 10th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 Processors, version 3431 and 8th Generation Intel® Core™ Processors, version 3349.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: before 10th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 Processors - version 3431
before 8th Generation Intel® Core™ Processors - version 3349
